backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, portfolios, and market-data fetchers with access control and Yahoo-backed HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file listing implemented features, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file providing short summaries of numerous frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with hash-based routing, auth handling, theming, and public vs authenticated page rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/charts/Allocatio: Recharts donut chart computing holding allocation values from quotes and rendering tooltip and legend.
frontend/src/components/charts/Performan: Displays a line chart of historical asset performance with selectable time ranges and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with a top navigation bar, toggleable sidebar, and content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Shows a list of portfolios with real-time metrics, provides a create-portfolio button, and handles navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, portfolio switcher, ticker search, settings menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/market/LastUpdat: Displays a live-updating timestamp showing how many seconds have passed since the last update.
frontend/src/components/market/TickerTyp: Provides a searchable ticker input with debounced lookup, keyboard navigation, and selectable dropdown results.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AddEdi: Modal for adding or editing a portfolio holding, including ticker search, share and cost inputs, and form submission.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Create: Dialog for creating a new portfolio with a name input and form submission handling.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Delete: Confirmation dialog that deletes a portfolio using a mutation and shows success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Holdin: Displays portfolio holdings with calculated metrics, loading skeletons, and optional edit/remove actions.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Dashboard card showing portfolio value, returns, sparkline chart, and navigates to the portfolio on click.
Panel for toggling portfolio public visibility and copying a generated shareable URL.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Remove: Confirmation dialog for removing a holding from a portfolio via mutation with toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Hook that returns a debounced version of a given value after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketData.ts: Provides React Query hooks for live quotes, ticker search, and historical data, supporting both Yahoo Finance and CoinGecko with crypto ID caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on portfolios and holdings using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Implements a light/dark theme hook that syncs with localStorage and updates DOM classes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/portfolioMath.ts: Contains functions to compute holding-level and portfolio-level metrics such as market value, returns, and daily change.
frontend/src/lib/symbols.ts: Provides helpers for symbol normalization, crypto ID mapping, and parsing Yahoo and CoinGecko API responses.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays all user portfolios with live quotes and loading states, rendering cards for each portfolio.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioDetailPage.t: Shows detailed metrics, charts, and management actions for a single portfolio with live price updates.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPortfolioPage.t: Renders a public, read‑only portfolio page, fetching portfolio data and live quotes and displaying holdings, allocation, and performance charts.
frontend/src/pages/TickerPreviewPage.tsx: Shows a preview page for a ticker with live quotes, crypto detection, current price, and a 30‑day historical chart.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, architecture, known issues, and implemented features for the portfolio tracking app.
